23.9. [Haimo of Auxerre] Commentarium in Epistolas Paulini.
Commentary | Pauline Epistles
Manuscripts:

189. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica lat. 653. saec. xi. (S,I-P)*
190. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica lat. 5736, f. 1-2; 57-58. saec. xi2. Rome, Santa Cecilia.
191. Vatican, Archivio San Pietro C.102, f. 1-361. saec xi mid. Italian. Attributed to Remigius in MS. Cf. Clavis 873,902.
192. Vatican, Archivio San Pietro C.103, f. 1-143. saec. xi inc. Italian. Attributed to Haimo.
193. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica Barb. lat. 580, f. 64-328. saec. xi1 (but what about Vat. BAL Barb. Lat. 850. Auxerre. St. Germain. Attributed to Remigius. Typo in S,I-P incorrect shelflist number)
194. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica Ottob. lat. 278, f. 86v-221. Abbreviated version, attributed to Remigius in MS. Stegmüller 7231-7244. *
195. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica Urb. lat. 86 (43). saec. xv. Attributed to Remigius Remensis. (S,I-P)
196. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica Urb. lat. 87. saec. xv. Attributed to Remigius. (S,I-P)
197. Vienna, Österreichische Nationalbibliothek 919. 294 ff. saec. xii2. As a homiliary.
Vienna, Österreichische Nationalbibliothek 944. saec. xiv. (S,I-P)
198. Vienna, Österreichische Nationalbibliothek 1216, f. 1-187. saec. xiii; P: Salzburg. No attribution in MS. (S,I-P)
199. Vienna, Österreichische Nationalbibliothek 1247. 1079. As a marginal gloss. (S,I-P)
200. Vienna, Österreichische Nationalbibliothek 1549, f. 1-169. saec. xii. (S,I-P)
201.. Vienna, Österreichische Nationalbibliothek 2195 [Salisb. 324], f. 68r-75v: saec. x & saec. xii. Haimo, Glossa super quaedam verba de epistola ad Romanos et ad Corinthios.
202. Vienna, Österreichische Nationalbibliothek 4795 [Nov. 67], f. 1v- 226v. saec. xv.
203. Vienna, Dominikaner 373-78, f. 1-155. II Cor. - Hebr. No attribution in MS. (S,I-P)
204. [Vitry-le-François, Bibliothèque municipale 22. saec. xiii.] (I-P)
205. Winchester, Cathedral Library XXVII.
206. Wolfenbüttel, Herzog-August Bibliothek Weissenburg 1, f. 75 and 85. saec. xii. Excerpts (PL 117: 555-560B, 651-666C) (I-P)
207. Wolfenbüttel, Herzog-August Bibliothek Weissenburg 46, f. 1-2. saec. ix. Excerpt (PL 117: 362). (I-P)
Cluny, catalogue, saec. xii: 430 Volumen in quo itidem (Haimo) ipse continetur in omnes epistolas Pauli apostoli.
Lobbes, 161.
Incorrectly attributed:
Rouen, Bibliothèque municipale 147 (A.437). saec. ix. P: Jumièges. 99 ff. Fragmentary. (I-P) Actually Bede, Stegmüller 1691-1631. See Heil, p. 338n23*
